title: Ujjivan Financial, Small Finance Bank hit 52-week lows; tank up to 7% - Business Standard
content: Ujjivan Financial, Small Finance Bank hit 52-week lows; tank up to 7%  Business Standard
description: Ujjivan Financial Services has corrected 60 per cent, while Ujjivan Small Finance Bank has slipped 55 per cent from their respective 52-week highs
